title: **4 WEEKS FREE** Immediate Move-Ins Available! Beautiful 3 BED/3BATH
posting_body: Everything you need for balanced living, with both apartment home and community-wide amenities designed to enhance your sense of well-being as well as your desire to connect with others.
One, two, and three bedroom apartment homes located in Aurora, Colorado.
Access to Denvers 53 Acre Park System
Side-by-side refrigerators with water dispenser in door

Pool courtyard with infinity edge, resort-style pool including tanning ledge, hot tub and pool bar; outdoor kitchen with both grilling stations and a smoker; ample sitting and lounging areas, plus fire feature
Fitness center with cardio and strength equipment and a movement studio featuring both yoga and spin cycles
Call or Text Tyler to set up your for Fast Personal Showings or Virtual Showings!
Pricing, availability and lease terms subject to change anytime!
